author: Marco Fioretti
description:
FOSS Force's Marco Fioretti asks LibreOffice's Italo Vignoli and Collabora's Naomi Obbard about why their software isn't used in more schools, and what can be done to turn that around.

The post We Asked LibreOffice and Collabora: Why Aren’t They in Schools Instead of Word and Google Docs? appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: We Asked LibreOffice and Collabora: Why Aren’t They in Schools Instead of Word and Google Docs?
